CS is not what it use to be, since going free it is toxic and full of rogue players not to mention the time it takes to find a match, vavle has lost their touch always bringing out new maps/gun mechanic changes/game play (if it isn't broken, don't fix it). Something will always go wrong in comp matches like poor network from their servers or random disconnects of team players (friend or foe) or just bad matchmaking with newbies/smerfs now that it is free.
